verses.roman:
dekhiyā lokera mane haila camatkāra
yata loka āise, keha nāhi yāya ghara

synonyms: dekhiyā—seeing all this; lokera—of the people; mane—in the minds; haila—there was; camatkāra—astonishment; yata—all; loka—people; āise—came there; keha—anyone; nāhi—not; yāya—goes; ghara—home.
translation: Everyone present was astonished to see Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's dancing and His bodily transformations. Whoever came did not want to return home.
